description: Associates a SignalingChannel to a stream to store the media. There are two signaling modes that you can specify :

parameters.name: ChannelARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the channel.

parameters.name: MediaStorageConfiguration
parameters.description: A structure that encapsulates, or contains, the media storage configuration properties. StreamARN (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream. The status of the media storage configuration.

nested_params.name: StreamARN
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the stream.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: The status of the media storage configuration.
